body:
So I just got my first gaming mouse, and I'm trying to set the sprint button as button 4, but in Minecraft options it registers as button 3. Does this happen to anyone else? Is there a way to fix it? Thanks.

I'm on a Mac, by the way, but that shouldn't make a difference if the setup is done in MC.
body_tagged:
So I just got my first gaming mouse, and I'm trying to set the sprint button as button 4, but in Minecraft options it registers as button 3. Does this happen to anyone else? Is there a way to fix it? Thanks.

I'm on a Mac, by the way, but that shouldn't make a difference if the setup is done in MC.
title: Minecraft Button 4 and 5 Setup

replies.body: Are you sure that mouse button 3 isn't the one your pressing? Have you tried playing with it set to that?
replies.body_tagged: Are you sure that mouse button 3 isn't the one your pressing? Have you tried playing with it set to that?

replies.body: Cool and I have never had that problem. No help here :D
replies.body_tagged: Cool and I have never had that problem. No help here :D

replies.body: I've tested all the buttons on the mouse, and they register as either button 1, 2, or 3.
replies.body_tagged: I've tested all the buttons on the mouse, and they register as either button 1, 2, or 3.

reply_to.body: Are you sure that mouse button 3 isn't the one your pressing? Have you tried playing with it set to that?
reply_to.body_tagged: Are you sure that mouse button 3 isn't the one your pressing? Have you tried playing with it set to that?

replies.body: Of your mouse has drivers I would try maybe reinstalling the drivers. If not maybe try to reset your mouse. I know there is a way to do it, but I don't know how. Good Luck :]
replies.body_tagged: Of your mouse has drivers I would try maybe reinstalling the drivers. If not maybe try to reset your mouse. I know there is a way to do it, but I don't know how. Good Luck :]

replies.body: There's nothing to reset, since I haven't configured anything. And no, it didn't come with drivers, which sucks. Also, the other buttons work anywhere else besides Minecraft.
replies.body_tagged: There's nothing to reset, since I haven't configured anything. And no, it didn't come with drivers, which sucks. Also, the other buttons work anywhere else besides Minecraft.

replies.body:
This is mildly related, but when I download the logitech gaming software for my g402 it won't recognize my mouse? Anyone know why?
Edit, Ive fixed the problem

replies.body: They are just buttons -.-, they do the same thing
replies.body_tagged: They are just buttons -.-, they do the same thing

reply_to.body: They are just buttons -.-, they do the same thing
reply_to.body_tagged: They are just buttons -.-, they do the same thing

replies.body: I just needed one with side buttons .-.
replies.body_tagged: I just needed one with side buttons .-.

replies.body: Try resetting controls and make sure they aren't binded to another open program. I've had that issue as well on League. If the one button fails, try assigning the task to a different side button.
replies.body_tagged: Try resetting controls and make sure they aren't binded to another open program. I've had that issue as well on League. If the one button fails, try assigning the task to a different side button.
